channel.title: mongodb on Tek Shinobi Blog
channel.description: Recent content in mongodb on Tek Shinobi Blog

item.title: MongoDB: Cheatsheet
item.description: create and run mongodb docker container: docker run --name mongodb -d -p 27017:27017 mongo:7 login to mongodb container: docker exec -it mongodb sh run mongosh to enter mongo shell > mongosh it will automatically show a test> prompt which is a default test database to clear screen: cls to ompletely exit out of mongosh and docker shell terminal: exit this command will show all dbs: show dbs to create a new database:
